issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement functions for creating literal expressions for all types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9534](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9534). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In logical_plan.rs we have the function `lit_str`. We should add equivalents for all supported literal types.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9534?focusedCommentId=17162812) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7811
